about.title: About
about.subtitle: Introduction
about.description: I am a Frontend Developer from Tashkent, Uzbekistan, with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I thrive in both team settings and individual projects, eager to deepen my knowledge and apply my skills to real-world products. I am hardworking, conscientious, and goal-oriented.
